glossaryTerms.name: PII
glossaryTerms.description: Personally Identifiable Information. Data that could be used to identify a specific individual.

glossaryTerms.name: Sensitive
glossaryTerms.description: Information that requires protection due to its sensitive nature but is not PII.

glossaryTerms.name: Confidential
glossaryTerms.description: Highly sensitive business information that should be restricted to authorized personnel only.

glossaryTerms.name: Public
glossaryTerms.description: Information that can be freely shared outside the organization.

glossaryTerms.name: GDPR
glossaryTerms.description: Data subject to General Data Protection Regulation compliance requirements.

glossaryTerms.name: PCI
glossaryTerms.description: Data subject to Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard compliance requirements.

glossaryTerms.name: HIPAA
glossaryTerms.description: Data subject to Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act compliance requirements.

glossaryNodes.name: Data Classification
glossaryNodes.description: Terms related to data sensitivity and classification.
